price: They seek to deceive Allah and those who believe, while they deceive none but themselves, but they do not realize.
arabic: يُخَٰدِعُونَ ٱللَّهَ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَمَا يَخۡدَعُونَ إِلَّآ أَنفُسَهُمۡ وَمَا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
